translation.local: 媒體 / 合作 聯絡:

translation.base: There are currently no trailers available for %s. Check back later for more or contact us for specific requests!
translation.local: 目前沒有 %s 的預告. 之後再回來看看，或是透過 聯絡我們 來提供你的需求喔

translation.base: There are far more images available for %s, but these are the ones we felt would be most useful to you. If you have specific requests, please do contact us!
translation.local: 如果需要更多%s的圖片或相關資訊，請 聯絡我們

translation.base: There are currently no logos or icons available for %s. Check back later for more or contact us for specific requests!
translation.local: 目前沒有%s的Logo或Icon. 之後再回來看看，或是透過 聯絡我們 來提供你的需求喔
下載所有截圖和照片的.zip壓縮檔 (%s)

translation.base: There are currently no screenshots available for %s. Check back later for more or contact us for specific requests!
translation.local: 目前沒有%s的遊戲截圖. 之後再回來看看，或是透過 聯絡我們 來提供你的需求喔

translation.base: Please fill in your e-mail address below and we'll get back to you as soon as a press copy is available for you.
translation.local: 請在下頭填寫你的e-mail，當副本準備好後，我們會盡快聯絡您.

translation.base: Alternatively, you can always request a press copy by sending us a quick email.
translation.local: 另外, 你可以 寄給我們一封信 來要求一份press的副本.

translation.base: Thanks for the request. We'll be in touch as soon as possible. In the meanwhile, feel free to follow up with any questions or requests you might have!
translation.local: Thanks for the request. We'll be in touch as soon as possible. In the meanwhile, feel free to follow up with any questions or requests you might have!

translation.base: We could not validate your email address. Please try contacting us using one of the options listed here.
translation.local: We could not validate your email address. Please try contacting us using one of the options listed here.

translation.base: Please fill in all the fields or try contacting us using one of the options listed here.
translation.local: Please fill in all the fields or try contacting us using one of the options listed here.

translation.base: We failed to send the email. Please try contacting us using one of the options listed here.
translation.local: We failed to send the email. Please try contacting us using one of the options listed here.

translation.base: More information on %s, our logo & relevant media are available here.
translation.local: More information on %s, our logo & relevant media are available here.

translation.base: %s does currently not allow for the contents of %s to be published through video broadcasting services.
translation.local: %s does currently not allow for the contents of %s to be published through video broadcasting services.

translation.base: %s does allow the contents of this game to be published through video broadcasting services only with direct written permission from %s. Check at the bottom of this page for contact information.
translation.local: %s does allow the contents of this game to be published through video broadcasting services only with direct written permission from %s. Check at the bottom of this page for contact information.

translation.base: %s allows for the contents of %s to be published through video broadcasting services for non-commercial purposes only. Monetization of any video created containing assets from %s is not allowed.
translation.local: %s allows for the contents of %s to be published through video broadcasting services for non-commercial purposes only. Monetization of any video created containing assets from %s is not allowed.

translation.base: %s allows for the contents of %s to be published through video broadcasting services for any commercial or non-commercial purposes. Monetization of videos created containing assets from %s is legally & explicitly allowed by %s.
translation.local: %s allows for the contents of %s to be published through video broadcasting services for any commercial or non-commercial purposes. Monetization of videos created containing assets from %s is legally & explicitly allowed by %s.

translation.base: This permission can be found in writing at %s.
translation.local: This permission can be found in writing at %s.
